group_1.narration: I'm going to get rid of my old self.@The people will provide me with a new identity.
I began my expedition to Takarazaki@with that mindset.
In the beginning,@I felt like I was wasting my time.@But now, almost a month later,@I'm happy that I started this.
I'm not happy about this situation, but@there has been a recent increase in crimes and accidents@in Takarazaki.
So, everyone needs to watch out...

group_1.textRight: I finally got my license, only to crash my car@right away...

group_1.narration: You may get too nervous,@and cause another accident.

group_1.textLeft: I don't want to shoplift anymore.@I wish I'd never done that...

group_1.narration: You may have reflected on your actions,@but ended up stealing something anyway.

group_1.textRight: I quit drinking because I don't want to hurt anybody.

group_1.narration: You may lose your temper,@and start a fight at any moment.
If something bad happens, we'll solve it, so don't worry.@But right now, in this town,@you never know who might turn out to be a criminal.

group_1.textLeft: Sorry to keep you waiting, Mitsune.

group_1.textRight: ...No, I'm the one who's sorry, for making you@come along with me...

group_1.textLeft: It's all right. I already made up my mind when@you became a Magical Girl.
In the first place, this was my idea.
So let's turn it into the truth.
